# The `ImmutablePass` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/immutablepass">ImmutablePass</a> class - This class is used to provide information that does not need to be run. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/immutablepass">ImmutablePass</a> class - This class is used to provide information that does not need to be run.

This is useful for things like target information.

Definition at line 281 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/pass-h">Pass.h</a>.

### initializePass() {#a9e88e7eff70a69eb7c338de34b30c401}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void ImmutablePass::initializePass ()"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
initializePass - This method may be overriden by immutable passes to allow them to perform various initialization actions they require.

This is primarily because an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/immutablepass">ImmutablePass</a> can &quot;require&quot; another <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/immutablepass">ImmutablePass</a>, and if it does, the overloaded version of initializePass may get access to these passes with getAnalysis&lt;&gt;.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/pass-h/#l00293">293</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/pass-h">Pass.h</a>, definition at line 157 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/pass-cpp">Pass.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### runOnModule() {#adf2254fe525ff5092785cbdaecf9e826}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::ImmutablePass::runOnModule (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
ImmutablePasses are never run.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/pass-h/#l00298">298</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/pass-h">Pass.h</a>.
